attributes.action: The right to buy should be brought back in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Long standing tenants out government or local authority housing should have the right to buy after 3 years
attributes.background: Bring back the right to buy in Scotland and the UK

rejection.details:
A right to buy in Scotland, is something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

https://www.parliament.scot/chamber-and-committees/committees/current-and-previous-committees/session-6-citizen-participation-and-public-petitions-committee
